original_text: Then Asa was wroth with the seer, and put him in a prison house; for he was in a rage with him because of this thing. And Asa oppressed some of the people the same time.
korean_text: 아사가 노하여 선견자를 옥에 가두었으니 이는 그의 말에 크게 노하였음이며 그 때에 아사가 또 백성 중에서 몇 사람을 학대하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Asa was wroth with the seer
and put him in a prison house
for he was in a rage with him
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 이 일 때문에 그에게 진노하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And Asa oppressed some of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 아사가 백성 중 어떤 사람들을 학대하였더라
